name: Epis
subtitle: Captivating Demon
description: A cold-blooded hedonist demon. Using a huge scythe, she harvests the souls of enemies. She suddenly appears in the midst of enemies, slashing everything around her.
story: This playful and bewitching succubus acts on her own whims. As expected of her Demon lineage, she is a hedonist driven by what she finds fun and enjoyable. Even during the Demon War, she chose traveling around on her own over joining the invasion. In her eyes, fighting alongside Kyle was interesting enough for her to even betray her own kind. When she later met Kasel, she gladly joined his party, knowing that she found another fun adventure for herself. When she finds attractive men, she sometimes visits them in their dreams.
like: Anything that strikes interest or curiosity

talk: Now just where are you staring at? Don't worry, I won't tell anyone...
Hmm..what, you want to try something exciting~?
recruit.gift: Oh, for me? Ooh, now then, what could you want in return~?

affinity.greet: Welcome, dear! Did you close the door?
talk: Oh, what did you expect? Oh, you are devious.
You want to know why a demon is siding with the humans? Does it really look like that? Ha ha.
affinity.gift: Not bad. You seem to know a little something about seduction. So, does that make you more like me?

relationship.greet: Hmm~ based off your expression, I'm assuming you met me in your dreams last night?
talk: Aha~so, how was your dream? Satisfying? Or would you like to continue where it left off...
Haaaah...There's this thing on my mind. I keep thinking about you...Do you know why~?
These clothes seem to be getting tighter. I wonder if I've gained weight...? Do you want to check for me, back at my room?

uw.story: A deadly scythe that matches the characters of its wielder, Epis. It reaps the souls of those who approach it to admire its beauty. Created from within Epis's own body, the weapon is much like a succubus itself. It delivers extreme pleasure to its victims before absorbing their life energy. It seems that, in a way, Epis tried to show some sort of kindness with this weapon.
